articles.title: Ex-England rugby league captain Sam Burgess GUILTY of intimidating his Australian father-in-law - Daily Mail
articles.description: Sam Burgess, who served captained England's rugby league team in 2016 and 2017, was found guilty of intimidation at a court in Australia on Friday and sentenced to a two-year community order.
articles.content:
Ex-England rugby league captain Sam Burgess has been convicted of intimidating his father-in-law during a heated clash in the wake of his break-up with wife Phoebe.
